Here is the list of signs with their scores and descriptions:
1. Aries - 7/10 - Natural-born leaders, but can be impulsive and reckless.
2. Taurus - 6/10 - Practical and dependable, but can be stubborn and resistant to change.
3. Gemini - 8/10 - Quick-witted and adaptable, but can be restless and unreliable.
4. Cancer - 9/10 - Emotional depth and nurturing qualities, but can be moody and clingy.
5. Leo - 8/10 - Confident and charismatic, but can be prideful and domineering.
6. Virgo - 7/10 - Analytical and hardworking, but can be perfectionistic and critical.
7. Libra - 9/10 - Diplomatic and social, but can be indecisive and people-pleasing.
8. Scorpio - 10/10 - Passionate and perceptive, but can be intense and obsessive.
9. Sagittarius - 8/10 - Adventurous and optimistic, but can be blunt and tactless.
10. Capricorn - 6/10 - Ambitious and disciplined, but can be serious and distant.
11. Aquarius - 8/10 - Humanitarian and unconventional, but can be detached and unpredictable.
12. Pisces - 9/10 - Compassionate and imaginative, but can be dreamy and irresponsible.
Note: These scores are subjective and based on general interpretations of the signs' characteristics.
